00111       template<typename _InputIterator>
00112   void
00113     assign(_InputIterator first, _InputIterator last)
00114   {
00115     // Check whether it's an integral type.  If so, it's not an iterator.
00116     typedef typename std::__is_integer<_InputIterator>::__type _Integral;
00117     M_assign_dispatch(first, last, _Integral());

00160   void
00161     resize(size_type new_size, const value_type& x)
00162   {
00163     if (new_size < size())
00164       erase(begin() + new_size, end());
00165     else
00166       insert(end(), new_size - size(), x);
00167   }

00170     resize(size_type new_size)
00171     { resize(new_size, value_type()); }

00174     capacity() const
00175     { return M_end_of_storage - M_start; }

00177   bool
00178     empty() const
00179     { return M_finish == M_start; }

00186       throw string("Out of space!"); 
00187     }

00229   void
00230     push_back(const value_type& x)
00231   {
00232     if(M_finish == M_end_of_storage)
00233       throw std::string("Out of space!");
00234     construct(M_finish, x);
00235     M_finish++;
00236   }
00237 
00238   void
00239     pop_back()
00240   {
00241     --M_finish;
00242     destroy(M_finish);
00243   }

00252       template<typename _InputIterator>
00253   void
00254     insert(iterator position, _InputIterator first,
00255     _InputIterator last)
00256   {
00257     // Check whether it's an integral type.  If so, it's not an iterator.
00258     typedef typename std::__is_integer<_InputIterator>::__type _Integral;
00259     M_insert_dispatch(position, first, last, _Integral());
00260   }
00261 
00262   iterator
00263     erase(iterator position)
00264   {
00265     if (position + 1 != end())
00266       std::copy(position + 1, end(), position);
00267     --M_finish;
00268     destroy(M_finish);
00269     return position;
00270   }
00271 
00272   iterator
00273     erase(iterator first, iterator last)
00274   {
00275     iterator i(std::copy(last, end(), first));
00276     destroy(i, end());
00277     M_finish = M_finish - (last - first);
00278     return first;
00279   }

00282   void
00283     swap(box& x)
00284   {
00285     std::swap(M_start, x.M_impl.M_start);
00286     std::swap(M_finish, x.M_impl.M_finish);
00287     std::swap(M_end_of_storage,
00288       x.M_impl.M_end_of_storage);
00289   }

00292     clear()
00293     { erase(begin(), end()); }

00297       // Called by the range constructor to implement [23.1.1]/9
00298       template<typename _Integer>
00299   void
00300     M_initialize_dispatch(_Integer n, _Integer value, __true_type)
00301   {
00302     M_start = M_allocate(n);
00303     M_end_of_storage = M_start + n;
00304     std::uninitialized_fill_n(M_start, n, value);
00305     M_finish = M_end_of_storage;
00306   }
00307 
00308       // Called by the range constructor to implement [23.1.1]/9
00309       template<typename _InputIterator>
00310   void
00311     M_initialize_dispatch(_InputIterator first, _InputIterator last,
00312     __false_type)
00313   {
00314     for (; first != last; ++first)
00315       push_back(*first);
00316 
00317   }

00319       // Called by the range assign to implement [23.1.1]/9
00320       template<typename _Integer>
00321   void
00322     M_assign_dispatch(_Integer n, _Integer val, __true_type)
00323   {
00324     M_fill_assign(static_cast<size_type>(n),
00325       static_cast<value_type>(val));
00326   }
00327 
00328       // Called by the range assign to implement [23.1.1]/9
00329       template<typename _InputIterator>
00330   void
00331     M_assign_dispatch(_InputIterator first, _InputIterator last,
00332     __false_type)
00333   {
00334     iterator cur(begin());
00335     for (; first != last && cur != end(); ++cur, ++first)
00336       *cur = *first;
00337     if (first == last)
00338       erase(cur, end());
00339     else
00340       insert(end(), first, last);
00341   }
00342

00344       // to be the same thing.

00346     M_fill_assign(size_type n, const value_type& val);

00355     __true_type)
00356   {
00357     M_fill_insert(pos, static_cast<size_type>(n),
00358       static_cast<value_type>(val));

00362       template<typename _InputIterator>

00364     M_insert_dispatch(iterator pos, _InputIterator first,
00365     _InputIterator last, __false_type)
00366   {
00367     typedef typename iterator_traits<_InputIterator>::iterator_category
00368       _IterCategory;
00369     M_range_insert(pos, first, last, _IterCategory());
00370   }

00395   template<typename T>
00396 inline bool
00397   operator==(const box<T>& x, const box<T>& y)
00398 { return (x.size() == y.size()
00399   && std::equal(x.begin(), x.end(), y.begin())); }

00402 inline bool
00403   operator<(const box<T>& x, const box<T>& y)
00404 { return std::lexicographical_compare(x.begin(), x.end(),
00405   y.begin(), y.end()); }

00422   operator<=(const box<T>& x, const box<T>& y)

00428   operator>=(const box<T>& x, const box<T>& y)

00438   template<typename T>
00439 typename box<T>::iterator
00440   box<T>::
00441 insert(iterator position, const value_type& x)
00442 {
00443   const size_type n = position - begin();
00444   if (M_finish != M_end_of_storage && position == end())
00445   {
00446     construct(M_finish, x);
00447     ++M_finish;
00448   }
00449   else
00450   {      
00451     if (M_finish == M_end_of_storage)
00452       throw string("Out of space!");
00453 
00454     construct(M_finish, *(M_finish - 1));
00455     ++M_finish;
00456     T x_copy = x;
00457     std::copy_backward(position,
00458       iterator(M_finish-2),
00459       iterator(M_finish-1));
00460     *position = x_copy; 
00461   }
00462   return begin() + n;
00463 }

00466 /*
00467   template<typename T>
00468 box<T>&
00469   box<T>::
00470 operator=(const box<T>& x)
00471 {
00472   if (&x != this)
00473   {
00474     const size_type xlen = x.size();
00475     if (xlen > capacity())
00476       throw std::string("Out of space!");
00477 
00478     if (size() >= xlen)
00479     {
00480       iterator i(std::copy(x.begin(), x.end(), begin()));
00481       destroy(i, end());
00482     }
00483     else
00484     {
00485       std::copy(x.begin(), x.begin() + size(),
00486         M_start);
00487       std::uninitialized_copy(x.begin() + size(),
00488         x.end(), M_finish);
00489     }
00490     M_finish = M_start + xlen;
00491   }
00492   return *this;
00493 }
00494 */
00495 
00496   template<typename T>
00497 void
00498   box<T>::
00499 M_fill_assign(size_t n, const value_type& val)
00500 {
00501   if (n > capacity())
00502     throw std::string("Out of space!");
00503 
00504   if (n > size())
00505   {
00506     std::fill(begin(), end(), val);
00507     std::uninitialized_fill_n(M_finish, n - size(), val);
00508     M_finish += n - size();
00509   }
00510   else
00511     erase(fill_n(begin(), n, val), end());
00512 }
00513 
00514   template<typename T>
00515 void
00516   box<T>::
00517 M_fill_insert(iterator position, size_type n, const value_type& x)
00518 {
00519   if (n == 0)
00520     return;
00521 
00522   if (size_type(M_end_of_storage - M_finish) < n)
00523     { throw string("Out of space!"); }
00524 
00525   value_type x_copy = x;
00526   const size_type elems_after = end() - position;
00527   iterator old_finish(M_finish);
00528   if (elems_after > n)
00529   {
00530     std::uninitialized_copy(M_finish - n, M_finish, M_finish);
00531     M_finish += n;
00532     std::copy_backward(position, old_finish - n,
00533       old_finish);
00534     std::fill(position, position + n, x_copy);
00535   }
00536   else
00537   {
00538     std::uninitialized_fill_n(M_finish, n - elems_after, x_copy);
00539     M_finish += n - elems_after;
00540     std::uninitialized_copy(position, old_finish, M_finish);
00541     M_finish += elems_after;
00542     std::fill(position, old_finish, x_copy);
00543   }
00544 }
00545 
00546   template<typename T> template<typename _InputIterator>
00547 void
00548   box<T>::
00549 M_range_insert(iterator pos, _InputIterator first,
00550   _InputIterator last, input_iterator_tag)
00551 {
00552   for (; first != last; ++first)
00553   {
00554     pos = insert(pos, *first);
00555     ++pos;
00556   }
00557 }
00558 
00559   template<typename T>
00560     template<typename _ForwardIterator>
00561 void
00562   box<T>::
00563 M_range_insert(iterator position, _ForwardIterator first,
00564   _ForwardIterator last, forward_iterator_tag)
00565 {
00566   if (first == last)
00567     return;
00568 
00569   const size_type n = std::distance(first, last);
00570 
00571   if (size_type(M_end_of_storage - M_finish) < n)
00572     throw string("Out of space!");
00573 
00574   const size_type elems_after = end() - position;
00575   iterator old_finish(M_finish);
00576   if (elems_after > n)
00577   {
00578     std::uninitialized_copy(M_finish - n, M_finish, M_finish);
00579     M_finish += n;
00580     std::copy_backward(position, old_finish - n,
00581       old_finish);
00582     std::copy(first, last, position);
00583   }
00584   else
00585   {
00586     _ForwardIterator mid = first;
00587     std::advance(mid, elems_after);
00588     std::uninitialized_copy(mid, last, M_finish);
00589     M_finish += n - elems_after;
00590     std::uninitialized_copy(position, old_finish, M_finish);
00591     M_finish += elems_after;
00592     std::copy(first, mid, position);
00593   }
00594 }

00596 #define MAKE_STACK_BOX(c, type, size) box<type> c((type*)alloca(sizeof(type) * size), size)
00597 
00598 // Now requires bool flag to be declared before the macro is used.
00599 #define GET_ASSIGNMENT(c, constraint) \
00600 const size_t num_vars##c = constraint->get_vars_singleton()->size();\
00601 box<pair<int, DomainInt> > c((pair<int,DomainInt>*)( alloca(sizeof(pair<int, int>) * num_vars##c * 2) ), num_vars##c * 2);\
00602 flag=constraint->get_satisfying_assignment(c);
